name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SpeedPlay - Video Speed Controller for Instagram, YouTube, LinkedIn & More

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adjust playback speed of videos to 0.5x, 1x, 1.5x, 2x, or 2.5x.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Why SpeedPlay?

1/ Get the Summary Quickly: Breeze through lengthy videos by speeding them up to capture the main points in less time.

2/ Accelerate Your Learning: Watch educational content at higher speeds to absorb information faster.

3/Improve Retention: Watch videos at 2x speed multiple times to reinforce memory and understanding.

4/ Focus on Details: Slow down playback to 0.5x speed to catch every nuance in tutorials or lectures.


Key Features
1/ Universal Compatibility: Works seamlessly on YouTube, LinkedIn, Vimeo, and any website with HTML5 videos.

2/ Easy-to-Use Interface: Adjust playback speeds directly from the extension popup with a single click.

3/ Multiple Speed Options: Choose from 0.5x, 1x, 1.5x, 2x, or 2.5x speeds to suit your needs.

4/ Instant Feedback: Receive immediate confirmation within the extension when the playback speed is changed.
